pr_title: Incorrect app name in the prod builds

timeline.message: Fixed the issue with the app name being "ui-components" instead of Dash Wallet in prod builds

timeline.bodyText: was this an intended change for this fix?
timeline.author: HashEngineering

replies.bodyText:
Perhaps because it was because this file was moved:  common/src/main/res/values/values.xml
But, then the getBlockExplorer will return null on new installs and that might make the "View in Explorer" link crash on the Tx Details screens.
replies.author: HashEngineering

timeline.message: Fixed the issue with the app name being "ui-components" instead of Dash Wallet in prod builds
Fixed the issue with the app name being "ui-components" instead of Dash Wallet in prod builds
